title: Capacitors - C parallel with 2R - in series with R

content.question: A battery of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>, two resistors, a capacitor, and a switch are connected as shown in the figure. The switch has been open for a long time and is then closed. What is the potential difference across the capacitor after the switch has been closed for a long time?

choices.label: <math alttext="one third script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>
<math alttext="two thirds script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="two thirds script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
